Could be worse I learned Japanese from a very nice lady who forgot to tel=
l me the difference between male and female inflexions and other subtle dif=
ferences between the sexes. Consequently I talked like a woman would and mo=
st of the guys I worked with in Japan thought I was gay.    Nothing like be=
ing pulled away by your boss and being told that the company doesn=92t like=
 to employ perverts.
 
 
Ambrose
